text: [Music]
launching a database stack is the next
step in deploying a SharePoint website
and the Amazon web services Cloud you
should already have launched the network
and active directory stack and created
an Amazon machine image of a customized
database server as shown in the previous
videos in this series this video shows
you how to launch the SharePoint
database stack based on the customized
SQL Server Ami using a cloud formation
sample template the template is a text
file with with ajso file extension
written in JavaScript object notation or
Json the AWS cloud formation service
uses the information in it to create a
stack of
resources launching this stack creates a
database tier on top of the previously
deployed networking and active directory
infrastructure and joins the database
server to The Domain the details of all
these procedures are spelled out in the
companion document before you launch the
stack you should have already manually
customized the most recently published
Ami of Microsoft SQL Server standard
2008 R2 and Windows Server 2008 R2 to
enable it for cloud
formation record the ID of the new SQL
Server Ami displayed in the ec2
Management console to use in the
following steps also look up and record
the following IDs in the virtual private
Cloud console for input into the
template VPC ID SQL Server Security
Group ID domain member Security Group ID
and SQL Server subnet ID launch the data
database stack with sample template 2 by
mousing over the launch stack button and
clicking the US East Northern Virginia
region this opens the create stack
Wizard and load sample template to it
creates three volumes in the new
instance one for the operating system
one for database files and one for log
files it also runs a Powershell script
that creates a SQL Server login for the
SharePoint Farm administrator account
and adds it to the appropriate
roles on the select template page give
the stack a name this example uses SQL
in the provider template URL box
template 2 SQL server.js for the region
you chose should already be displayed
click
continue on the specified parameters
page enter the IDS that you looked up in
the VPC
console you can change the default for
most of the other parameters to match
your organizational
standards check the box labeled I
acknowledge that this template May
create I am resources click continue for
this example you can skip the ad tags
page and click continue on the review
page make sure all the information is
correct if you need to change anything
click the edit stack edit parameters or
edit notification links then click
continue this launches the stack
creation
process click
close in cloud formation manager you can
follow the progress of Stack creation by
clicking the events
tab you can you can update the page
periodically by clicking the refresh
button when the stack status is create
complete click the outputs tab of the
cloud formation console the SQL server
net bios name is displayed in the value
column use this net bios name to connect
to your SQL Server instance using remote
desktop protocol via your rgw instance
to verify that the configuration is
correct or to perform other tasks you've
now deployed a primary SQL server in the
database tier on top of the existing
virtual private cloud and other network
and active directory infrastructure to
customize this installation you can
download the cloud formation template
and modify it to meet your
requirements the advanced implementation
guide tells you how the next step in
deploying a SharePoint website in the
Amazon web services cloud is to create
an Amazon machine image of a customized
application server
[Music]
